summary: The legend of Jack The Ripper comes to life when one of his descendants revive him.
cast: Craig Bonacorsi|Erica Curtis|Jonathan Kowalsky|Jessica Szabo|Josh Evans|Alicia Klein|Travis Quentin Young|Garrett Brawith|Pamela Porter|Jeremy Flynn|Lauren Cashman|Matthew Nelson|Jeff Allen|Tricia Allen
title: The Legend of Bloody Jack
